IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ENRICH THE ACTIVITIES, EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS, ATHLETICS AND SCHOLARSHIPS OF SALISBURY UNIVERSITY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE PURPOSE OF THE FOUNDATION IS TO ENRICH THE ACTIVITIES, EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS, ATHLETICS AND SCHOLARSHIPS OF SALISBURY UNIVERSITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE INTENDED USE OF THE ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS IS TO ENRICH THE ACTIVITIES, EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS, ATHLETICS, AND SCHOLARSHIPS OF SALISBURY UNIVERSITY.

THE FOUNDATION IS RECOGNIZED BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE AS AN ORGANIZATION DESCRIBED UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND IS GENERALLY EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAXES ON RELATED INCOME. HOWEVER, INCOME FROM CERTAIN ACTIVITIES NOT DIRECTLY RELATED TO THE FOUNDATION'S TAX-EXEMPT PURPOSE MAY BE SUBJECT TO TAXATION AS UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME. THE FOUNDATION BELIEVES IT HAS APPROPRIATE SUPPORT FOR ANY TAX POSITIONS TAKEN, AND AS SUCH, DOES NOT HAVE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT ARE MATERIAL TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. TAX YEARS CONSIDERED OPEN AND SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION INCLUDE RETURNS FOR THE FOUNDATION FOR THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2020 THROUGH JUNE 30, 2022.

LINE 2D: AMOUNTS REPRESENT FUNDRAISING EVENT EXPENSES (FOR 990, PART VIII, LINE 8B). THESE EXPENSES ARE SHOWN AS REDUCTIONS OF REVENUE ON FORM 990, BUT ARE INCLUDED WITH EXPENSES ON THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. EXPENSES INCURRED ON FUNDRAISING INCOME TOTAL
THE RECIPIENT MUST PROVIDE SUPPORTING DOCUMENTATION/RECEIPTS FOR THE PURPOSE FOR WHICH THEY WERE REWARDED THE GRANT
OTHER-MISCELLANEOUS = COATS, GOLF BAGS, GOLF CAPS, LIVE OAK TREES, GOLF GIFT SET, BRACELET, OYSTER SHELLS, CAN OPENERS, COOLERS, OGIO SPRINT PACK, PIANO & PIANO BENCH, POLK AUDIO TUNER & SUBWOOFER

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS MAY HAVE BUSINESS RELATIONSHIPS WITH OTHER BOARD MEMBERS AS PART OF A NORMAL COURSE OF BUSINESS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND GOVERNING BODY REVIEW THE FORM 990 BEFORE IT IS FILED

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OFFICERS AND DIRECTORS ARE REQUIRED TO FILL OUT A FORM ANNUALLY DISCLOSING ANY CONFLICT OF INTEREST. THE ORGANIZATION MONITORS AND ENFORCES COMPLIANCE ON A REGULAR BASIS. IF A SITUATION ARISES REGARDING A CONFLICT OF INTEREST, THE ORGANIZATION'S EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE WILL DISCUSS THE SITUATION AND MAKE A DECISION REGARDING THE MATTER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SALISBURY UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION, INC. IS AFFILIATED WITH A STATE OF MARYLAND INSTITUTION (SALISBURY UNIVERSITY), AND IT ABIDES BY THE STATE INSTITUTION'S STANDARD COMPENSATION SCHEDULES. THE FOUNDATION REIMBURSES SALISBURY UNIVERSITY FOR ALL PERSONNEL COSTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO VIEW ON ITS WEBSITE. ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
